description.en:
From ShoujoMagic:

1) Lovers Flowers
It is believe that if a couple kisses during the fireworks festival, they will be together forever. In order to make the miraculous legend come true, Hayuri decides to confess. The one she likes is the basketball club’s captain, Hara-sempai. When she goes to see him, holding her letter, the guy who comes out is the basketball member, Konohana, Hayuri’s classmate. With Konohana’s idea, Hayuri becomes the club’s manager. But she gets introduced as Konohana’s girlfriend!?

2) Go Burst â˜† Girl!
Aki once beat her beloved friend Yousuke (whom she likes), in karate. Now he says he doesn't have anything to do with that, so he acts randomly. She feels regretful. Trouble appears, and the kendo's captain wants to go out with her...?!

3) FAKE!!
Saori is able to tell counterfeits, or fakes, from the real articles. She uses this talent to suit her goal of getting back her dead mother's necklace from two men that treated her cruelly after her father's death.
